name: Nebulon
description: Nebulon is a simple 2D-Platformer prototype. The game has a main menu with a options menu and a shop. The goal of Nebulon is to complete the level and collect all of the coins. The Player moves with "A" and "D" and jumps with "W" or "Space". The backgrounds of the game are selfmade and childfriendly. The jumps are easy but some of them are difficult.
